00048                                                         "phys_trigger_enter";

00051                                                         "phys_trigger_leave";

00054                                                         "phys_obj_collision";

00060 PhysicsEventListener::PhysicsEventListener( IGamePhysics *pPhysics )
00061         : m_pPhysics(pPhysics)

00070 bool PhysicsEventListener::HandleEvent( Event const & event )
00071 {
00072         if (stricmp(event.getType().getStr(),Evt_PhysObjCollision::gkName)==0)
00073         {
00074         }
00075         else if (stricmp(event.getType().getStr(),Evt_PhysObjSeparate::gkName)==0) 
00076         {
00077                 // handle pressure plates, etc.
00078         }
00079         else if (stricmp(event.getType().getStr(),Evt_PhysTrigger_Enter::gkName)==0) 
00080         {
00081                 // handle phys obj entering trigger volume
00082 
00083                 EvtData_PhysTrigger * evtData = event.getDataPtr<EvtData_PhysTrigger>();
00084                 
00085                 NxShape * triggerShape = evtData->m_pTrigger;
00086                 NxShape * otherShape   = evtData->m_pOther;
00087                 NxTriggerFlag status   = evtData->m_status;
00088         }
00089         else if (stricmp(event.getType().getStr(),Evt_PhysTrigger_Leave::gkName)==0) 
00090         {
00091                 // handle phys obj leaving trigger volume
00092 
00093                 EvtData_PhysTrigger * evtData = event.getDataPtr<EvtData_PhysTrigger>();
00094                 
00095                 NxShape * triggerShape = evtData->m_pTrigger;
00096                 NxShape * otherShape   = evtData->m_pOther;
00097                 NxTriggerFlag status   = evtData->m_status;
00098         }
00099 
00100         return false;
00101 }
00102 
00103 #endif
